data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Campania, Italy to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Campania, Italy
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, there are 4,652,596 people in the state of Campania who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, help the 84,845 believers in Campania to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Campania, Italy.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Italian-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Campania to agree with you and with one another.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Campania, Italy into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Campania to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
